title: Awakening Crow Moon: and Other Poems and Short Stories
description: A Wild and Wonderful Experience in the Poetry of LifeAwakening Crow Moon is a collection of poems, a painting in words, vividly portraying Wild Wonderful West Virginia nature and life themes in various patterns as well as a West Virginia galâ€™s perception of classical music and art. Included in this anthology are three suspense stories that take place in West Virginia.
author: Shirley Hedrick Williams
